subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Petra Kvitova will chase her second W.T.A. finals title after outplaying third-seeded Maria Sharapova, 6-3, 7-6 (3), in the semifinals Saturday in Singapore.
snippet: Petra Kvitova will chase her second W.T.A. finals title after outplaying third-seeded Maria Sharapova, 6-3, 7-6 (3), in the semifinals Saturday in Singapore.
